experience.title: Backend developer intern
tasks: Backend Java developer working with a gaming website collaborating with multiple teams at Opera and Yoyo games.
Working in a small backend team deveoping the product from a relatively early stage was a new experience for me in a professional setting.

experience.title: Backend developer intern
tasks: Backend Java development working with a fin-tech product.
Worked as a part of the backend team which was great learning experience.

experience.title: Test engineer intern
tasks: Automated web testing in python using selenium.
Manual testing of different hardware and software, purpose built for use within elder care.
Manual Software testing of mobile applications.

experience.title: Teaching assistant
tasks: Assisted students in a introductory python course.
After the course I worked with updating and refreshing the course contents for future years.

experience.title: Nursing assistant, elder care
tasks: Widely varied duties ranging from medicinal and other nurse duties to social presence and cleaning.
Included a one-week nursing education which was concluded with a medicinal exam.

studentUnion.title: Student Union
studentUnion.description: On this page one finds different volunteer commitments I have had within Software Engineering division of the Chalmers Student Union.

positions.title: Lay auditor for the IT division
positions.description: As a lay auditor for the IT division I, together with my collegues, look at the bookkeeping of the division and present a report during the division meeting regarding the state of the economy of the different committes of the division.

positions.title: Secretary of the board
positions.description: As a member of the division board I had a wide range of responsibilities including representing the division members towards the university as well as the student union council and taking care of the division's internal affairs.

positions.title: Lay data protection officer
positions.description: As a data protection officer of the IT division I was responsible for being sufficiently knowledgeable in GDPR and related laws to examine and council the division in matters regarding personal data management.

positions.title: Deputy chairman of digIT
positions.description: digIT is a group responsible for developing and maintaining the IT divisions digital systems and services as well as the hardware for these systems.
